events.name: eds-footer-link-clicked
events.description: Fired when a link in the footer is clicked and exposes the object/link data

properties.name: horizontalMobile
properties.description: Layout flag for displaying links with children horizontally on small screen

properties.name: middleUtility
properties.description: Array of utility navigation items to render with name and url objects, for marketing

properties.name: navigation
properties.description: Array of navigation items to display in the footer

properties.name: preventRedirection
properties.description: Flag used to prevent redirection on link clicks

properties.name: status
properties.description: Array of status items to display in the footer

properties.name: utility
properties.description: Array of utility navigation items to render with name and url objects

EDSFooter.description: The **footer** is the bottom-most element of the application interface and is persistently displayed across all screens of the application user experience. The footer may serve as the primary container for key application-wide tools such as utility navigation, links, notifications, and access to user settings.
EDSFooter.name: Footer

events.name: eds-footer-link-clicked
events.description: Fired when a link in the footer is clicked and exposes the object/link data
